verses.verse: Moreover Ahithophel <WH302> said <WH559> unto Absalom <WH53>, Let me now choose out <WH977> twelve <WH8147> thousand <WH505> men <WH376>, and I will arise <WH6965> and pursue <WH7291> after <WH310> David <WH1732> this night <WH3915>:
